## This will install necessary 

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| include: true
#| label: setup
#| warning: false


library(httr2)
library(rmarkdown)
```

## Source the script that has the Functions

```{r}
#| include: true
#| echo: false
#| label: functions

# get an api key from the fred website


json_file <- jsonlite::fromJSON("../secrets.json")

fred_api <- json_file$api_key

source("../scripts/fred-api.R")

```



## Get the `Fed Funds Rate` 


```{r}

get_fred_series

fed_funds_df <- 
  get_fred_series(
    "DFF",
    "2000-01-01",
    "2024-11-01",
    "lin",
    fred_api)

```
